name: GetWatchingList
description: Returns list of your watching issues.

queryParams.name: order
queryParams.description: Order of the sort “asc” or “desc” default=“desc”

queryParams.name: sort
queryParams.description: What to sort results by. The value “created”, “updated” or “issueUpdated” are allowed. default=“issueUpdated”

queryParams.name: count
queryParams.description: Number of records to retrieve(1-100) default=20

queryParams.name: offset
queryParams.description: Where to start returning records from the entire results. default=0

queryParams.name: resourceAlreadyRead
queryParams.description: Whether the issues already read are retrieved or not. The all watching issues are returned if this parameter is omitted. The read watching issues are returned if true. The unread watching issues are returned if false. default=null
